titleNullable: Twitter: Trending Tweets per week (updated weekly)
subtitleNullable: Twitter trending data (Tweets, Trends, Trend-Hashtags) gets updated weekly.
descriptionNullable:
> Twitter trending data (Tweets, Trends, Trend-Hashtags) gets updated weekly.


### Content
`all_trends_data.csv`: This file contains data for all trends whether the trend is with a hashtag or not.
`hashtag_trends_data.csv`: This file contains data for all trends only with the hashtag.
`twitter_trending_data.csv`: Tweet data for the trends.


### Acknowledgements
This dataset was collected using the Twitter API.

### Inspiration
This data collected to see what trends the most at which time frame.
Twitter contains vast information which can be used for many use-cases. Though I didn't explore it yet but I'm sure it can be used in many ways.
